result.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡقَصَصُ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
result.translation: 62.Diggah Nabii Mucammadow tama Nabii Qiisâ caagidik kol maaqncm cakkiiy Agay-waaga mali, hebeltô Yallay Qibaada cakkisita mayan inki Yallak-sa, Diggah Yalli usuk Mayso-li Naggaara.
